name: Ink Inc. (itch) (worm11113)
description:
Ink Inc. is a game where you play as an ink blob moving around small test chambers and solving puzzles. Every time the ink blob moves, it loses a unit of ink, but by backtracking on his ink trail, he can gain it back. Make it through every puzzle without losing all of your ink and you win the game.

Features:

Buttons: put ink on it to open the doors

Size doors: have at most the amount of ink indicated

Rocks: have at least the amount of ink indicated to move it

Inkwells: collect the amount of ink indicated

Controls:

Move with WASD

R - restart level

F, G , H, J - Autoplay

Credits:

Eliah Walker - Lead Designer, Programmer

Michael Xiang - Lead Programmer

Nicolas Alarcon - Artist, Sound Design

Ethan Malmstrom - Level Designer

Ian Lekven - Artist

Edward Benes - Artist and Designer
